articles.title: Rohan Bopanna and Ramkumar Ramanathan win doubles title in Adelaide - ESPN India
articles.description: The unseeded pair beat the top seeds in the final to mark a victorious debut on the ATP Tour.
articles.content:
India's Rohan Bopanna and Ramkumar Ramanathan won the men's doubles title at the Adelaide International ATP 250 event on Sunday.
